summary.body: We've inherited a beige carpet which has got some nasty black streaks - they're at right angles to the carpet edges, several inches long, and an inch or two apart.  Does anyone know what causes this, and how to remove (or preferably prevent) it?  Hoovering & shampooing make no difference. We want to replace the carpet, but don't want the new one to suffer the same fate. Thanks to anyone who can advise.
